org.nzdis.micro.messaging.network

Interface NetworkConnectorInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NettyNetworkConnector

    public interface NetworkConnectorInterface
    The NetworkConnectorInterface describes necessary functionality to be supported by network transport mechanisms.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $ $Date: 2010/11/14 00:00:00 $
    Author:
    Christopher Frantz

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Integer getPort()
      Returns the bound (server) port.
      java.lang.String getPrefix()
      Indicates a prefix to augment eventual debug output with meaningful source reference.
      boolean networkStarted()
      Indicator if network is started.
      void sendMessage(Message message, java.lang.String host, int port) 
      void setSerialization(java.lang.String serialization) 
      void shutdown()
      Shuts down the network transport.
      void startNetwork()
